title: Leaked Email Reveals How MSNBC Producer Talks to Team Hillary When No One Is Looking.
content:
In a leaked 2015 email sent to a well-placed Hillary Clinton adviser , an MSNBC producer offered over-the-top praise for the former secretary of state in a somewhat embarrassing attempt to book a Clinton aide as a guest .
Sheara Braun , a producer for MSNBC ’ s “ All In With Chris Hayes , ” showered Clinton in praise throughout the email to campaign spokeswoman Adrienne Elrod and bragged about the “ Hillary Clinton for Millennials ” segment they had been running every night . The point of the segment , the producer said , was to inform young people about “ all the crap and nonsense ” Clinton faced during her husband ’ s presidential run in the 1990s .
After requesting to have Clinton aide Lisa Caputo on the show , Braun took the Hillary praise to the next level :
“ The point isn ’ t to dwell on the past but the point is to talk about this amazing , intelligent woman who probably faced more nonsense back in the day because she is a woman…and she continues to have to face it . She is smarter than most men and more qualified than most men to be president . ”
Reactions to the email have varied . Some have pointed to it as glaring evidence of media bias , while a few have defended Braun and argued the producer was merely fighting for access as the booker for the show .
I ’ m not a journo and even I am embarrassed by this , @ chrislhayes @ jason_howerton — ERS Drive ( @ ersdrive ) October 7 , 2016
@ jason_howerton @ chrislhayes wow… Grasping at straws , it is embarrassing and so pathetic… . Amazing how they continue to fawn over her . — CaraBeanHer ( @ LeafsNation77 ) October 7 , 2016
@ jason_howerton @ chrislhayes No bias . Nope . Never ! Move along – nothing to see here . — Cindy Scheer Jackson ( @ ScheerCindy ) October 7 , 2016
@ jason_howerton @ chrislhayes Uh , that ’ s the bookers job . Regardless of what you feel about HRC . — Blue Max ( @ Smithwinterk ) October 7 , 2016
@ jason_howerton Not even close to CNN/Lewandowski situation . @ bennyjohnson @ chrislhayes — Mark Twayn ( @ Mark_Twayn ) October 7 , 2016
